name: Gardener Simulator - Early build
description:
A little try to learn Unity 3D development, with multiplayer.

This project is STOPPED on Unity. I'll make a new Garderner Simulator on Unreal Engine 4, my favorite tool.

No bug will be fixed in this version !
I work on a new version on UE4, the Unity version is juste a proof-of-concept.

Feel free to comment to share your ideas.

Movements : ZQSD
Change seed : 1 - 6
Plant : left-click
